text: Injustice 2 is a fighting video game for the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It was developed by NetherRealm Studios and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. It is the second main game in the Injustice series based on characters from DC Comics. == Characters == === Default characters === * Aquaman * Atrocitus * Bane * Batman * Black Adam * Black Canary * Brainiac * Catwoman * Cheetah * Cyborg * The Flash * Gorilla Grodd * Green Arrow * Green Lantern * Harley Quinn * The Joker * Poison Ivy * Supergirl * Superman * Wonder Woman === Downloadable characters === * Black Manta * Enchantress * Darkseid * Donatello * Hellboy * Leonardo * Michelangelo * Raphael * Red Hood * Starfire * Sub-Zero ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2017 video games Category:NetherRealm Studios games Category:Warner Bros. video games Category:2.5D fighting games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Crossover video games Category:IOS games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about alien invasions Category:Video games about terrorism Category:Video games based on DC Comics Category:Video games based on Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Category:Video games set in Atlantis Category:Video games set in psychiatric hospitals Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: Injustice 2
